short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click to switch to socks5 or direct connection mode according to the page.
short.zh_CN: 可根据访问页面，点击切换使用socks5或者直连模式，插件会针对每一个网站记录上次切换使用的网络模式以便下次自动使用该模式。已经配置了socks5的页面，点击切换后会在图标上显示徽章，D表示直联模式，S表示socks5模式，E表示socks5地址不可用，任然采用…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Users hope that the browser they browse can choose whether to use a network proxy according to different browsing websites. Some users in closed environments hope to directly access resources on the site and use proxy servers for resources outside the site.
2. Users often don’t know whether the websites they would visit requires a proxy or not. In order to determine whether to use a proxy when using it, our plug-in can switch socks5 proxy or direct mode with one click when the user accesses the page, which is very convenient.
3. Users do not need to repeat settings the next time they visit the website, the plug-in will automatically record and use the last settings.
4. Users can easily see the current network usage pattern through the plug-in seal.
5. For high-traffic sites such as video websites, the traffic of cross-domain requests such as cors is consistent with the network proxy of the main domain name. There will be no proxy software that only proxies the main domain name like general proxy software.
6. General proxies will directly let users set a lot of addresses in advance. Most of these addresses may not be used, but they will occupy memory and introduce a lot of calculations when Chrome selects the network. This plug-in is based on users adding according to actual access, greatly improving speed and flexibility.
7. You can choose to use socks5 connection or direct connection by default for addresses with no access records.
long.zh_CN:
1. 用户希望自己浏览的浏览器能够根据不同的浏览网站来选择是否使用网络代理，一些封闭环境的用户希望对于站内资源直接访问，而对于站外资源使用代理服务器。
2. 用户很多时候并不知道自己即将要访问的网站是否需要代理才能访问，为了在使用时才能确定是否使用代理，我们的插件可以在用户访问页面时一键点击切换 socks5 代理或者直联模式，非常方便。
3. 用户无需在下次访问该网站时重复设置，插件会自动记录并使用上次的设置。
4. 用户可以非常方便地通过插件印章看到当前网络的使用模式。
5. 对于视频网站等大流量站点，其跨域请求如 cors 的流量和主域名的网络代理是一致的，不会存在像一般代理软件那样的只代理主域名而跨域流量未真正使用代理。
6. 一般的代理会直接让用户提前设置很多地址，可能这些地址大部分并不会被用到，但是会导致占用内存和 chrome 选择网络时引入大量计算。该插件是基于用户根据实际访问去添加，大大提升速度和灵活性。
7. 可选择对于没有访问记录的地址，默认试用socks5连接还是直连。
